widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (130, 17), size = (390, 60), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the language name, MultiContentEntryPixmap(pos = (20, 10), size = (60, 40), png = 2), # index 2 is the pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 24)], "itemHeight": 60 }

screen.name: ChoiceBox
screen.title: Input
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 80, textsize[1] + 80) count = len(self.list) if count > 10: count = 10 offset = 32 * count wsizex = textsize[0] + 80 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset + 20
if (710 > wsizex): wsizex = 710 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 20, 32 * count) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint((1280-wsizex)/2, (720-wsizey)/(count > 7 and 2 or 3)))

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(10,2), size=(170, 20), text = 1, backcolor = MultiContentTemplateColor(3)), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(190,2), size=(80, 20), text = 2, flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER, backcolor = MultiContentTemplateColor(3)) ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 25 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = ( 10, 7), size = (520, 27), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 Title, MultiContentEntryText(pos = ( 10, 40), size = (430, 24), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (540, 7), size = (170, 24), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 3), # index 3 begin time, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (450, 40), size = (160, 24), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 4), # index 4 channel, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (610, 40), size = (100, 24), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # index 5 duration, ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 24), gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 75 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(10,2), size=(170, 20), text = 1, backcolor = MultiContentTemplateColor(3)), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(190,2), size=(80, 20), text = 2, flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER, backcolor = MultiContentTemplateColor(3)) ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 25 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmap(pos = (20, 10), size = (60, 40), png = 2), # index 2 is the pixmap, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 17), size = (340, 30), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the language name ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 26)], "itemHeight": 65 }

screen.name: MessageBoxSimple
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint if self.timerRunning: titleheight = 20 else: titleheight = 0 self.setTitle("") orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgheight = self.instance.size().height() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 50, textsize[1] + 20) wsizex = textsize[0] + 60 wsizey = textsize[1] lenlist = len(self.list)*25 if (lenlist > 125): lenlist = 125 if (64 > wsizey): wsizey = 64 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: wsizey += lenlist + 10 if (280 > wsizex): wsizex = 280 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey + titleheight) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.move(ePoint(65, 8 + titleheight)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) self["ErrorPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(5, 5 + titleheight)) self["ErrorPixmap"].instance.resize(eSize(53,53)) self["QuestionPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(5, 5 + titleheight)) self["QuestionPixmap"].instance.resize(eSize(53,53)) self["InfoPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(5, 5 + titleheight)) self["InfoPixmap"].instance.resize(eSize(53,53)) if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: listsize = (wsizex-4, lenlist) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(2, wsizey - lenlist + titleheight - 2)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y() + (orgheight - wsizey)/2))

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0], textsize[1] + 80) offset = 40 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 100 wsizex = textsize[0] + 40 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (750 > wsizex): wsizex = 750 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 40, 64) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(20, textsize[1] + 25)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

screen.name: ExtraMessageBox

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (5, 0), size = (48, 48), png = 0), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (65, 10), size = (425, 38), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_TOP, text = 1), ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22)], "itemHeight": 50 }

screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgheight = self.instance.size().height() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["message"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... if self["message"].getText() != "": textsize = (textsize[0] + 80, textsize[1] + 60) else: textsize = (textsize[0] + 80, textsize[1] + 4)
count = len(self.list) if count > 7: count = 7 offset = 48 * count wsizex = textsize[0] + 80 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset + 20
if (460 > wsizex): wsizex = 460 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["message"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 20, 48 * count) self["menu"].downstream_elements.downstream_elements.instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1] + 10)) self["menu"].downstream_elements.downstream_elements.instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] newheight = wsize[1] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y() + (orgheight - newheight)/2))
